RumorFact.Text: The Nomai conducted a survey expedition to the exterior of Dark Bramble.

ExploreFact.Text: The Nomai found frozen species inside this glacier on the underside of Dark Bramble's north pole.

The Nomai hypothesized that these species originated within this planet, and were launched within shards of ice when the planet was destroyed by the bramble - landing on planets that would become their new habitats.
A cluster of anglerfish eggs guarded fiercely by anglerfish deep within Dark Bramble.
A Nomai named Escall discovered this nest on a desperate mission to reach the Vessel to rescue the members of escape pod 3. He.. met a gruesome end.
Escall noted that the eggs were warm, gelatinous, and filled with liquid.
